QA.title: Frequently Asked Questions
QA.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our article publishing services. Need more help? Contact our support team.
QA.faq1_question: What is your article distribution service?
QA.faq1_answer: We help you publish articles across high-authority news websites to boost your brand visibility, SEO, and online credibility.
QA.faq2_question: Can I choose which websites my article gets published on?
QA.faq2_answer: Yes, you can browse our list of partner websites, view metrics like domain authority, audience, and pricing, then select where you'd like to publish.
QA.faq3_question: Do you offer content writing, or do I need to provide the article?
QA.faq3_answer: You can either provide your own article or request professional content writing from our team for an additional fee.
QA.faq4_question: How long does it take for the article to be published?
QA.faq4_answer: Publishing time varies by website but typically takes between 1 to 5 business days after approval.
QA.faq5_question: How do I track the status of my publication request?
QA.faq5_answer: You can track your request in your dashboard under the 'My Orders' section. We'll also send you email updates at each step.

Footer.description: Mawthoqpost is your trusted partner for press release distribution. We help businesses amplify their message across top news platforms, build credibility, and drive real media coverage.
Footer.stayConnected: Stay connected with us on social media:

About.aboutDescription: Mowthoq Post is your trusted platform for sharing press releases and stories across major media channels. We build your credibility and amplify your digital voice.
About.ourMissionText: To deliver high-impact media distribution services that empower brands and individuals to be seen, heard, and trusted across the web.
About.ourVisionText: To be the most reliable Arabic gateway for media exposure — fast, transparent, and effective.
About.wideMediaReachText: Get your content published on global news websites quickly and reliably.
About.easyToUseText: A simple and intuitive platform that doesn’t require technical knowledge.
About.humanSupportText: Our friendly team helps you every step of the way with real guidance.
About.buildAuthorityText: Grow your brand, boost credibility, and get noticed in your industry.

Support.supportDescription: We're here to help you with any questions or issues you may have. Browse our FAQs or contact our support team for assistance.
Support.faqQuestion1: How do I contact customer support?
Support.faqAnswer1: You can contact us via our contact form, or reach out to us through email or live chat.
Support.faqQuestion2: What payment methods do you accept?
Support.faqAnswer2: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods.
Support.faqQuestion3: How can I track my order?
Support.faqAnswer3: You can track your order through the tracking link sent to your email once your order has been shipped.
Support.whatsappSupportMessage: Contact us on WhatsApp for help :
